Anypoint Platform Details

Host

The host of your Anypoint Platform Installation. By default, this value points to https://anypoint.mulesoft.com. If you are using Anypoint Platform Private Cloud Edition make sure to pass the address where you are hosting the platform. If you are using Anypoint Platform EU Cloud, make sure you pass your EU complaint URL.

Username

Anypoint Platform username to authenticate as.

Password

Password for supplied username.
